Вы находитесь в розыске.
Вы пытались раннее уговорить меня. Больше не потерплю ваших слов.

Время:
Голосование за заключение мира с {KINGDOM_NAME}
Место постоянного сбора жителей, где все танцуют и социализируются, что повышает ежедневную мораль поселения.
{LORD.NAME} член клана {CLAN_NAME}, {CLAN_DESCRIPTION} фракции {FACTION_NAME}, которая поддерживает {RULER} в гражданской войне. {?LORD.GENDER}Известна{?}Известен{\?} в своих кругах {REPUTATION}
Вы можете знать меня как человека чести.
Это рискованный шаг и я ставлю под угрозу жизнь себя и моих людей. Мне нужна какая-нибудь поддержка от вас перед тем, как начну доверять вам.
У меня нет ответа на это.
Как {?IS_FEMALE}королева{?}король{\?} вы должны решить, следует ли применять политику {POLICY_NAME}.

{ARMY_OWNER_TEXT} {ARMY_BEHAVIOR}

налогообложение землевладельцев на их собственность
Или, быть может, один из ваших спутников наряду с {COMPANION_NEED_GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} золота и с небольшой помощью {ALTERNATIVE_TROOP_AMOUNT} людей сможет всё провернуть..
Персонаж может использовать более эффективный метод производства древесного угля, который производит 3 единицы древесного угля из 2 единиц древесины.
Конечно вы знаете что {HERO.FIRSTNAME} является {RELATIONSHIP} так же как и мой вассал, и всегда сможет рассчитывать на мою преданность.
Продолжай, дитя мое.
Права На Охоту
Я должен кое-что сказать. Ваши люди говорят, что их зарплаты удерживают. Мы должны позаботиться, чтобы этого больше не произошло.
Честь

Тарелка вареников из баранины
Арендаторам запрещается покидать земли своих лордов без предварительного уведомления.
Ухаживание
Недавно я купил право пасти скот возле деревни {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. Трудно найти хорошие пастбища. Но теперь местные жители доставляют моим людям неприятности.
Очень хорошо, тогда...
Атаковать армию
Бонус Стургийская Закалка
Покинуть армию

Караван прибыл в {SETTLEMENT_LINK}.
Разрушитель стен
Стадо и пастухи готовы к отъезду.
Армии во главе с кланами уровня 5+ требуют на 10% меньше влияния.{newline}Влияние клана правителя уменьшается на 1 каждый день
Вы не смогли увезти сельчан из оспариваемого пастбища. Землевладелец, {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, считает, что вы подвели {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}ее{?}его{\?}.
Будете медлить - моих людей повесят на эшафоте. Поторопитесь же, ну!
Вы прекратите осаду, если уйдете. Вы уверены?

Пока нет, но скоро будет.
Хмм.. Нет... {IMMEDIATE_FAILURE_LINE}
Ваш контракт с {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} еще не закончился. Я не могу вас отпустить без {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}ее{?}его{\?} разрешения.
Как {?IS_FEMALE}королева{?}король{\?} вы должны решить, следует ли отказываться от политики {POLICY_NAME}.
Лошадей
Мы должны наградить новый клан этой землей
Пехота
Оплатить {FINE}{INFLUENCE_ICON}
Я просто надеюсь, что вы сможете поскорее доставить скот.
Как уже говорил о побеге из битвы...
Вы теперь мои пленники.
Доставьте пленных к поселению {ISSUE_OWNER.LINK} или поговорите с {TARGET_HERO.LINK}, чтобы договориться {?TARGET_HERO.GENDER}об ее{?}о его{\?} освобождении.
Вот некоторые документы из канцелярии.
Вы не командуете этой осады.
Всего хорошего. Прощайте.
О, спасибо вам {PLAYER.NAME}. Наш народ всегда будет помнить вас. Прощайте.
Я принес {AMOUNT_TO_DELIVER} единицы {REQUESTED_GOOD} как мы и договаривались.
Мой вассал {QUEST_GIVER.NAME} также попросил передать вам {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} динаров в обмен на пленных.
Тип отряда:
Атакуйте!
{HOSTILE_FACTION} и {SETTLEMENT_FACTION} больше не враждуют.
Я помогу, если смогу.
К сожалению. У меня нет никаких животных на этот раз.
У вас нет {BRIBE_COST} динар.
Мхм...мне не нужно больше людей. Спасибо.
Было приятно поработать с вами, вождь. Прощайте...
Он будет в восторге. Я скажу ему, чтобы он присоединился к вам как можно скорее.
предоставление селянам право пастись на земле, находящейся в общей
Штраф бартера снижается на 15%.

{MOTHER} из вашего клана только что узнала, что она беременна.
Я найду для вас {TOTAL_COUNT} групп из разбойников.

Вам не нужны наемники? У меня есть контракт, который могу передать вам за {DEMAND_GOLD} динар.
Увеличить выносливость (ВЫН) на 1.
Если не хотите влезать в битву, то оставьте несколько спутников и {NUMBER_OF_TROOPS} своих солдат на пару дней.
'Над кит-путь она умчалась она были укомплектованы мертвых и тучи вслед за черным в ней просыпает

{ISSUE_OWNER.LINK} схватил в плен {TARGET_HERO.LINK} {?ISSUE_OWNER.GENDER}себе{?}себе{\?}, ваш контракт с {ISSUE_OWNER.LINK} расторгнут.
тип элемента

Запросить Переговоры
Вы теряете из виду караван. Найдите его, прежде чем он попадет в беду.
Спасибо, {?PLAYER.GENDER}миледи{?}мой лорд{\?}. Ваш спутник без сомнения будет очень полезен.
Женщина
Покинуть...
Пожалуйста не убивайте нас. Мы сдаемся.[rf:idle_angry][ib:nervous]
Вы как и обещали, продали наемников другому лорду. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} благодарен и передает {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}ее{?}его{\?} поздравления.
Да? Что теперь? [sp:/Modules/Russian/Sounds/bandit_caught2.ogg]
Всё в порядке, {?HERO.GENDER}миледи{?}мой лорд{\?}. Дела идут хорошо, но могло быть и лучше. Цены повышаются, но то что нужно моим людям в целом доступно.
Соляная Шахта
Что-то ещё?[rb:trivial]
Увеличение отношения с противоположным полом на 20%
Я не думал, что я мог бы жениться на Дева. Но это интригует. Скажи мне, Ты убивал людей в бою?
Бонус Процветания Империи
Честно, что вы думаете о вашем вассале, {HERO.FIRSTNAME}?
Я все еще думаю, что мы может быть не готовы еще.
Странствующие Слухи
Тебе сначала придется сразиться с нами![rf:idle_angry][ib:aggressive]

Да, {?PLAYER.GENDER}моя леди{?}мой лорд{\?}... Ремесленники, вроде меня, обязаны покупать сырье у местных торговцев. Но они не предлагают разумных цен. Они все собрались вместе и договорились о одинаковых ценах, которые просто безумно высокие. Им все равно, если это нас разорит. Вы можете остановить их указом... Этим самым помочь нам.
Законы {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT} диктуют, что ремесленники могут продавать продукцию по той же цене, что и местные торговцы. И теперь они жалуются, что торговцы ставят завышенные цены.
'Моя любовь далеко,{newline}И не знаю я где.{newline}Возможно, ветра сообщат тайны мне'
Забудьте.
Сдаться.
Нейтральный
Приятно слышать это! Безопасное путешествие.
Большинство людей за несколько медяков всадили бы тебе нож в спину. Думаю, нужно всегда держать друзей при себе.
Оставить
Разведчик Перки
Ничего, вы можете идти.
Это решение было поддержано Советом.
Сию минуту, {?PLAYER.GENDER}мэм{?}сэр{\?}.[rf:happy][rb:very_positive]
{ISSUE_GIVER.NAME} хочет продать вам украденный товар. Цена низкая из-за дополнительного риска.
{HERO.LINK} повысил уровень.

Отступление!
Вы должны внести сумму {REQUIRED_AMOUNT} больше, чтобы выполнить свою часть сделки.
Я постараюсь заслужить доверие вашей семьи, то.
Как вы хотите...

То, что мы сделали там, в той деревне... Но я этого не делал. Я не хотел в этом участвовать.
Каждое повышение навыка после 250 увеличивает вас размер отряда на +1.
Убежище было очищено кем-то другим. Ваше соглашение с {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} отменено.
Заключить мир с {KINGDOM_NAME}
Значимые услуги
Я дал клятву своему сеньору. Нарушить её, даже по уважительной причине, было бы большим пятном на моей чести.
"{CHILD.NAME} хочет поиграть!"
Миледи, может ты дашь мне еще один шанс проявить себя?
Как {?IS_FEMALE}queen{?}king{\?} Вы должны решить, будет ли объявлена война {KINGDOM_NAME}

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} ремесленник из {ISSUE_GIVER_SETTLEMENT} жаловался вам на то, что из-за местных законов они не могут продавать свои товары по желаемой цене. Вы же согласились прислать {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_TROOP_COUNT} ваших людей вместе с компаньоном для контрабанды {?ISSUE_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} товаров для “друга” в {TARGET_TOWN}. Они вернутся к вам через {RETURN_DAYS} дней с немалой суммой {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON}
Вы не смогли принести оружие в {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} вовремя.
Замок {SETTLEMENT_LINK} принадлежит {LORD.LINK}, {FACTION_OFFICIAL} из {FACTION_TERM}. {KEEP_INFO}

Вам удалось вернуть все войска {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} и обучить их. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} посылает вам следующее письмо. “{?PLAYER.GENDER}Madam{?}Sir{\?}, Спасибо, что присматриваешь за моими людьми. Вы выполнили наше соглашение, и я вам очень благодарен. Пожалуйста примите это {GOLD}{GOLD_ICON}.”
Дождаться темноты, чтобы напасть
Конечно. Мне Рады во всех дворах Кальрадии. Мало кто может это сказать! Так что всегда будьте уверены, что где-то зарыт горшок с динарами, и верный слуга, который может найти его в спешке.
Извиняюсь. На этот раз у меня для вас ничего нет.
Чит: Следуйте за мной
Политик
Пожертвовать Войска
Вы успешно совершили набег на деревню.
{HERO.FIRSTNAME} из {CLAN_NAME}
{NUMBER_OF_TROOPS} присоединились к вам.
Оставь себе свою монету, староста. Благословений твоего народа вполне достаточно.
Казармы Гарнизона

Некоторые королевства, особенно те, которые произошли от города-государства или племени, имели народные собрания, на которые большинство его членов имели право присутствовать. Их полномочия часто были ограничены, поскольку они могли встречаться только периодически, но все же давали общественности право участвовать в управлении государством.
Я могу только надеяться, что если они узнают мою преданность, они примут меня.
Да. Это очень много, но я могу заплатить.
Ваш сеньор, {HERO.FIRSTNAME}, не стоит вашей верности.
Караванщик
Ну, я не отрицаю, что в тебе есть что-то такое, к чему меня тянет.
Я уверен, что вы сделали ошибку, но есть законы. Передайте контрабанду мне, и на этом все закончится.
Мечники на лошадях
компания наемников
{ARMY} был расформирован.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, староста {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} просил вас доставить {GRAIN_AMOUNT} единицы зерна до {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}him{\?} чтобы использовать в качестве семян. Иначе крестьяне не смогут засеять свои поля и будут голодать в наступающем сезоне. Вы согласились привезти {GRAIN_AMOUNT} единицы зерна как можно скорее.
Я не предам своего сеньора. (Убеждение в верности не удалось.)

Они не хотят делить между собой пастбища. Но я потратил свое серебро, и у меня есть право собственности. Мне нужно, чтобы кто-то ехал вместе с моими пастухами и убирал всех, кто встанет у них на пути.
{VICTIM.NAME} умер от старости. {?VICTIM.GENDER}Her{?}His{\?} родные и близкие будут помнить {?VICTIM.GENDER}her{?}him{\?}.
Наш славный лидер
Вы находитесь рядом с ареной. {ADDITIONAL_STRING}
Путешествуя по невысоким холмам, вы видите останки места разбивки лагеря в овраге ручья.
Войска
{AGGRESSOR_RULER.NAME} из {AGGRESSOR_KINGDOM} предпочел не воевать с {KINGDOM}, с участием {?AGGRESSOR_RULER.GENDER}ее{?}его{\?} council evenly split.
Вернулся за добавкой, да?
{CURRENT_LIEGE.NAME} он не известен тем, что держит свое слово.
Еще раз приветствую вас. Чем мы можем вам помочь?

Я знаю, что ты занят, но, может быть, ты попросишь кого-нибудь из своих людей найти нам это зерно? Двадцати мужей хватит, чтобы сделать эту работу, и я думаю, что это займет две недели. Я в отчаянии, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}... Не позволяйте нашим детям голодать!
Народный врач

Держу пари, даже отряд из {ALTERNATIVE_COUNT} хорошо обученных людей в сопровождении одного из ваших лейтенантов смогут разобраться с любой бандой, которую они встретят на своем пути. Дайте им, скажем, {TOTAL_DAYS} дней... Этого будет достаточно.
Расчет
Среди своих последователей, соперников и врагов врагов вы, должно быть, встретили немало интересных людей...
Культура правления
Фаланга
запрет жильцам покидать земли своих господ
Правители могут быстро произвести деньги, начеканив больше монет, но это приведет к росту цен.
Уже Встречались
Это будет конец осады. Вы не сможете взять свои осадные орудия, и они будут уничтожены.
Регулярные учения для простолюдинов, увеличивают набор в ополчение.
(Рифма) "дождь, дождь уходи прочь"
Ваше здоровье слишком низкое для сражения.
Смотреть турнир
Да. Я могу найти нового лорда, чтобы нанять его.
{LORD.NAME} - {TITLE} из фракции {FACTION_NAME} и глава клана {CLAN_NAME}, {CLAN_DESCRIPTION} королевства. {?LORD.GENDER}Известна{?}Известен{\?} в своих кругах как {REPUTATION}
Стоимость влияния, необходимого для аннексии поселения, уменьшается на 50% для клана правителя
Надежный военачальник
{CLAN_NAME} закончил свой контракт наемника и стал вассалом в {NEW_FACTION_NAME}
Вы получили записку и большой кошелек от {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. В записке было сказано: ”Стадо в безопасности. Благодарю вас и пожалуйста примите это {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} в знак нашей благодарности.”.

Вы приняли запрос {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} по поиску {TOTAL_COUNT} различных отрядов разбойников в окрестностях {QUEST_SETTLEMENT} и решили выследить их лично. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Она{?}Он{\?} наградит вас {AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} золота, как только вы с ними справитесь.
Отдайте мне все ваши товары!

Да, некоторые люди испытывают нехватку денег в наши дни. Они собрали стадо в {ANIMAL_COUNT_TO_DELIVER} {HERD_TYPE_TO_DELIVER} для продажи в {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. Но эти люди бедны. Совсем не бойцы, и они не могут позволить себе охрану. Если они пойдут туда сами. то будут легкой добычей для бандитов.
Я надеюсь, что смогу принести на эту землю мир и справедливость и смогу облегчить страдания людей.
Правитель клана клана получает 100 динаров в день за каждый город в королевстве\nЛояльность поселений уменьшается на 1 в день
Нет необходимости обороняться. Патрулировать местность.
О, у меня длинный список счетов. Вы можете быть уверены в этом.
{PRIOR_LINE} Мы были вместе во многих войнах. В том числе против {PEOPLE_OR_ALLIES}, {ETHNIC_TERM}, я хотел бы добавить.
Разве твоя страсть ко мне не может преодолеть столь низменные чувства?
Городской гарнизон на 20% эффективнее (в охране).
Скорость исцеления увеличивается +{a0}%

Но это не значит, что война не может быть прибыльной! В действительности, все еще может!

У меня уже есть план решения. Устроим приманку. Я заплатил нескольким людям, чтобы они распространяли слухи об особенно ценном караване, который, как предполагается, будет загружен столовым серебром. И отсюда едем в сторону {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. Конечно, это ловушка. Их ждет большой сюрприз. Вооруженные люди прячутся и выдают себя за караванщиков. Я хочу убедиться, что мы с ними справимся. Следуйте за моим караваном. Держитесь на должном расстоянии, пока его не атакуют. Затем вступите в сражение и прикончите бандитов раз и навсегда. Мой агент, который выдает себя за хозяина каравана, заплатит вам {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} за неудобства, когда бой закончится.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK}, землевладелец в {SETTLEMENT}, {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}сказала{?}сказал{\?} вам что {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}она{?}он{\?} нуждается в заключенных для использования в {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} шахты в качестве ручных рабочих. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}Она{?}Он{\?} просила вас привести хотя бы {NEEDED_PRISONER_AMOUNT} заключенных, но {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}она{?}он{\?} он будет доплачивать, если вы принесете больше. Вы согласились принести {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}ей{?}ему{\?} хотя бы {NEEDED_PRISONER_AMOUNT} заключенных, и вам будут заплатят в десять раз больше их рыночной цены за каждого.

Your father was a bailiff for a local feudal magnate. He looked after his liege's estates, resolved disputes in the village, and helped train the village levy. He rode with the lord's cavalry, fighting as an armored knight.
Fear not. I will find the right market for your {SELECTED_ITEM} myself.

The gang leaders who kept watch over the slums of Calradian cities were always in need of poor youth to run messages and back them up in turf wars, while thrill-seeking merchants' sons and daughters sometimes slummed it in their company as well.
Honor represents your reputation for respecting your formal commitments, like keeping your word and obeying the law.
Your family were respected traders in an oasis town. They ran caravans across the desert, and were experts in the finer points of negotiating passage through the desert tribes' territories.
Your clan/faction is now at war with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}'s faction. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has been canceled.
While lacking experience a bit, you are full with youthful energy, you are fully eager, for the long years of adventuring ahead.

In wartorn Calradia, especially in frontier or tribal areas, some women as well as men learn to fight from an early age. You...
This is the right age for starting off, you have years of experience, and you are old enough for people to respect you and gather under your banner.

Your family tilled the soil in one of the oases of the Nahasa and tended the palm orchards that produced the desert's famous dates. Your father was a member of the main foot levy of his tribe, fighting with his kinsmen under the emir's banner.

Your family tilled one of the small patches of arable land in the steppes for generations. When the Khuzaits came, they ceased paying taxes to the emperor and providing conscripts for his army, and served the khan instead.
{SALUTATION}... You came for me!
Urban troops spend much of their time guarding the town walls. Most of their training was in missile weapons, especially useful during sieges.

You avoided service with one of the main forces of your realm's armies, but followed instead in the train - the troops' wives, lovers and servants, and those who make their living by caring for, entertaining, or cheating the soldiery.
Urban merchants
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} died and your mission is canceled.

Your father worked for a fitiwi, one of the strongmen who keep order in the poorer quarters of the oasis towns. He resolved disputes over land, dice and insults, imposing his authority with the fitiwi's traditional staff.
You helped dig wells, rethatch houses, and fix broken plows. You learned about the basics of construction, as well as what it takes to keep a farming community prosperous.
Javelins you throw penetrate shields like ballista bolts.

Your family arranged for you to accompany a chieftain of your people. You were not given major responsibilities - mostly carrying messages and tending to his horse -- but it did give you a chance to see how campaigns were planned and men were deployed in battle.
You could never have bought the equipment on your own but you were a good enough rider so that the local lord lent you a horse and equipment. You joined the armored cavalry, training with the lance.
at docks and building sites.

Your family had little land of their own, so they earned their living from the woods, hunting and trapping. They taught you from an early age that skills like finding game trails and killing an animal with one shot could make the difference between eating and starvation.

All of Calradia's kingdoms recognize the value of good light cavalry and horse archers, and are sure to recruit nomads and borderers with the skills to fulfill those duties. You were a good enough rider that your neighbors pitched in to buy you a small pony and a good bow so that you could fulfill their levy obligations.
with the alley gangs.
you defeated an enemy in battle.
Not yet my {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. I am working on it.

Your family's clan never pledged its loyalty to the khan and never settled down, preferring to live out in the deep steppe away from his authority. They remain some of the finest trackers and scouts in the grasslands, as the ability to spot an enemy coming and move quickly is often all that protects their herds from their neighbors' predations.
You were sent by the village healer up into the hills to look for useful medicinal plants. You learned which herbs healed wounds or brought down a fever, and how to find them.
similar to that enjoyed by nobles.
You have failed to raid required number of enemy villages. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is disappointed.
trained with the infantry.

Urban vagabonds

I'm ready to rejoin you. I'm in your debt.

Good. See if you can hit {NUMBER_OF_TARGET_VILLAGE} villages. They won't be able to ignore that kind of damage. I'll give you {BASE_REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} for doing that, and {EXTRA_REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} more for every extra one that you raid. Agreed?
stood guard with the garrisons.
Mercy represents your general aversion to suffering and your willingness to help strangers or even enemies.

Your father was a bard, drifting from chieftain's hall to chieftain's hall making his living singing the praises of one Battanian aristocrat and mocking his enemies, then going to his enemy's hall and doing the reverse. You learned from him that a clever tongue could spare you from a life toiling in the fields, if you kept your wits about you.
Showing mercy to a settlement that shares your faction’s culture requires no influence.\n
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has made peace with the {ENEMYFACTION_INFORMALNAME}. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has been canceled.

Your family arranged for you to be part of the staff of an imperial strategos. You were not given major responsibilities - mostly carrying messages and tending to his horse -- but it did give you a chance to see how campaigns were planned and men were deployed in battle.
The guard accepts your offer. He is ready to help you break {PRISONER.NAME} out, if you're willing to pay.

All towns had their share of projects that were constantly in need of both skilled and unskilled labor. You learned how hoists and scaffolds were constructed, how planks and stones were hewn and fitted, and other skills.
served as a baron's groom.
The enemy no longer holds any villages. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} has canceled your mission.
Your family were merchants who lived in one of Sturgia's great river ports, organizing the shipment of the north's bounty of furs, honey and other goods to faraway lands.
I'm at your service my {?ISSUE_OWNER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. Just tell me the details.
Your family were small farmers with just enough land to feed themselves and make a small profit. People like them were the pillars of the kingdom's economy, as well as the backbone of the levy.

Your family owned a smithy in a city. Your father played an active if minor role in the town council, and also served in the militia.
When a sudden storm caused the local stream to rise suddenly, your neighbors needed quick-thinking leadership. You provided it, directing them to build levees to save their homes.

Younger recruits, or those of a slighter build, or those too poor to buy shield and armor tend to join the skirmishers. Fighting with bow and javelin, they try to stay out of reach of the main enemy forces.

{DEFAULT_TEXT}{ARMY_LEADER.LINK} grants {?ARMY_LEADER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} men their customary right of pillage after a successful siege. {?ARMY_LEADER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} tells them they may take property but must spare the townsfolk’s lives.

{ENCOUNTER_LEADER.LINK} thanks you for helping in the siege of {SETTLEMENT}. You were able to loot your fallen foes, but you do not participate in the sack of the {?IS_TOWN}town{?}castle{\?} as you are not part of the army that took it.

Your parents didn't give you much money, but they did leave just enough for you to purchase a plot of unused land at the edge of the village. You cleared away rocks and dug an irrigation ditch, raised a few seasons of crops, than sold it for a considerable profit.
joined the kern.
Because of a recent breakout attempt in this settlement it is on high alert. The guard won't even be seen talking to you.

joined a commander's staff.

Yes. It's about the war with the {ENEMYFACTION_INFORMALNAME}. We need to tie up some of their forces. A relatively small force moving quickly through their lands and raiding their villages should be a good distraction. Their lords will need to chase the raiders and won't be able to threaten us elsewhere. You seem to be the right {?PLAYER.GENDER}warrior{?}man{\?} for the job. What do you say? You'll have my gratitude and you'll be well rewarded if you succeed.
You were employed as a hired hand at the town's stables. The overseers recognized that you had a knack for horses, and you were allowed to exercise them and sometimes even break in new steeds.

Yours wasn't the kind of reputation that local legends are made of, but it was the kind that wins you respect among those around you. You were consistently fair and honest in your business dealings and helpful to those in trouble. In doing so, you got a sense of what made people tick.

Most children around you had only the most rudimentary education, but you lingered after class to study letters and mathematics. You were fascinated by the marketplace - weights and measures, tallies and accounts, the chatter about profits and losses.
Increase the party size limit by +5.
You took your family's goods to the nearest town to sell your produce and buy supplies. It was hard work, but you enjoyed the hubbub of the marketplace.

Your family arranged for you to accompany a minor baron of the Vlandian kingdom. You were not given major responsibilities - mostly carrying messages and tending to his horse -- but it did give you a chance to see how campaigns were planned and men were deployed in battle.

Your parents were healers who gathered herbs and treated the sick. As a living reservoir of Battanian tradition, they were also asked to adjudicate many disputes between the clans.

You were quick on your feet and attentive to what was going on around you. Usually you could run away from trouble, though you could give a good account of yourself in a fight with other children if cornered.

Your family numbered among the many poor migrants living in the slums that grow up outside the walls of imperial cities, making whatever money they could from a variety of odd jobs. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} says that a {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_TITLE} named {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME} is stirring up unrest in the countryside. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} asked you to disperse {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME}'s band using whatever means necessary before the movement gets enough support.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} from {QUEST_GIVER.FACTION} asked you to take over {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} in the name of {QUEST_GIVER.FACTION} to fortify war efforts. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} said {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} will aid you with {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} once the {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} is fallen.

Yes... As you know, the wars this realm has fought have been very costly. The great lords in particular are hard-put to raise the armies that are key to this land's defense. Some of us have proposed increasing the hearth taxes paid by the peasantry, which is a key source of revenue. I don't know if this law will be approved, but rumors of it have gotten out in my district, and a lot of the farmers are restless. Now, most of us are doing their part to keep a lid on things. But there's one, {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME}, who I am ashamed to say was once a {TOP_TIER_CAV_TITLE} under my banner, who's been going around the countryside, stirring up trouble. He's gathered a following and they have a whole list of demands, including a ban on new taxes, that would frankly cripple our realm's ability to raise the money needed to defend itself. I'd take care of him myself, but that wouldn't look good. Maybe you can help?

Not that I can think of. But if you don't want to do it, you can nominate someone from your party. It's not going to be easy, though. Whoever you name should be a good leader and have a good knowledge of tactics, and should take along at least {ALTERNATIVE_SOLUTION_NEEDED_MAN_COUNT} men. I'm ready to pay {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} for your service. And if it comes to a fight, you can take whatever loot you want as spoils of war.
You received a message from {ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}. 'It was a pleasure doing business with you and your folks.'
{TARGET_SETTLEMENT} is taken. You did not participate in this battle. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is moot.
I think that's enough. Here is your payment.
I don't think we'll have any more problems at {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}, thanks to your men. Please give them our thanks, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
You can also send me a recruiter: a trustworthy companion who is good at leading men, and also enough of a rogue to win the trust of other rogues...
Your men are still getting us the tools. I ask for your patience. We very much appreciate this.
After listening to the town merchants, you decided to let the merchants continue price-fixing.
Party Name:
{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK} wants you to stop the {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME}'s movement before it turns into a strong resistance.
Increases stack size for quivers by 4.
Recruiting and upgrading infantry troops are 25% cheaper.
You are no longer in the same faction with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is no longer valid.
{QUEST_GIVER}'s informants reported that {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME}'s party has been seen near {VILLAGE}.
I pray for your warriors. The people here will be very glad to hear of their success.
{TARGET_SETTLEMENT} is taken by {NEW_OWNER_FACTION}. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is no longer valid.
I have heard your companion has started to sell the goods. This was a good deal, {?PLAYER.GENDER}ma'am{?}sir{\?}.
Yes, that's sedition all right. Disperse now or face the consequences.
{TOWN_NAME} has been besieged by {FACTION_NAME}
I am very grateful to you for sparing your men to help us get what we need for a fair price.
I'll find your recruits.
You must resolve pending decisions
Let me try to talk some sense into you...
{DEFAULT_TEXT}{ARMY_LEADER.LINK} fell during the fighting. {?ARMY_LEADER.GENDER}Her{?}His{\?} troops, reluctant to harm their {CULTURE_ADJ} kinfolk, forego their traditional right of pillage.
20% more relationship penalty from kingdom decisions.

{ISSUE_GIVER.LINK}, lord of {SETTLEMENT}, says that a {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_TITLE} named {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME} is stirring up unrest in the countryside. You asked your companion to deal with {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME}'s band. They should rejoin your party in {RETURN_DAYS} days
You issued a decree to remove the restrictions on the sale of goods and protected the artisans as you promised.
On second thought, I have decided not to interfere with the merchant's business.
Daily wages of troops in the party are increased by 5%.
I will talk no more. Get ready to fight.
I am still waiting for news from {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. Thanks again for sparing your men.
{TARGET_SETTLEMENT_OWNER.FACTION} and {QUEST_GIVER.FACTION} had made peace. Your agreement with {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is moot.
Don't worry. I will send my best men to deal with this.
Very well. But every day he's out there spreading sedition make things more dangerous for all of us.
I am sure your men are as capable as you are and will look after my caravan. Thanks again for your help, my friend.
How are your preparations to take {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} coming along, {PLAYER.NAME}? I have assured my other lords that you will take it, so it will look bad if you fail.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} asks you to provide them supplies for their military campaign.
Count my troops. Then count yours. You have no chance.
You have failed to deliver enough recruits in time. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} must be disappointed.
Wise decision.
If you start a rebellion, you're just going to get a lot of peasants around here killed...
This may be tricky, my {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}...
I see. What do you want from me?
I am glad to service my kingdom. I have no interest in serving another liege.
We are still waiting for your men to arrive, {?PLAYER.GENDER}ma'am{?}sir{\?}. The village needs the animals they are bringing.
Discarded armors can be donated to troops for increased experience.
Recruiting and upgrading mounted troops are 10% cheaper.
All right, I will send you someone from my party who fits your bill.
We're still preparing the ambush. I hope to have your men back to you shortly.
You have failed to take over {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} in time. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} is disappointed that you have failed to take the fortress in time.
Ransom Offer
I haven't heard any news from {SETTLEMENT}, but I realize it might take some time for your men to deliver the recruits.
They are going as planned, my {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}...
His band has been going about from village to village. Find him and stop him. You can tell him he's guilty of sedition, and if he doesn't disperse, then you can use force.
The Conquest of {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}
I am still waiting for news from {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}. Once again, I appreciate that you could spare the men to do this.
Discarded weapons can be donated to troops for increased experience.
A courier from {CLAN_NAME} brings an offer of {GOLD_AMOUNT}{GOLD_ICON} for the freedom of {CAPTIVE_HERO.NAME}.
Recruiting lords to armies costs %20 more influence.

Our war with the {TARGET_SETTLEMENT_FACTION_INFORMAL_NAME} is going well enough. But there are some who say that we don't enough to show for all the blood and silver we've spent. A clear victory at this stage would do a lot of good. I think I would like to see our banner flying from the towers of {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}.
No thank you. Good day to you.
Good. I look forward to presenting you with your reward.
Actually, I don't have any available men right now...
Consequences? You would shed the blood of {RULER.NAME}'s loyal servants just for raising their voices against oppression?
You decided to issue a decree banning the merchants' price-fixing arrangement.
Yes, we know where he is. It's just a matter of time to catch them.
{?PLAYER.GENDER}Madam{?}Sir{\?}, I am happy to tell that the men you left are patrolling, and already we feel safer. Thank you again.
5% more renown from the battles, 15% more income while serving as a mercenary.

{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} a gang leader of {SETTLEMENT} told you that {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} needs recruits for {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} gang. {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}She{?}He{\?} asked you to bring {NEEDED_RECRUIT_AMOUNT} looters or bandits who you have recruited into your party. You have agreed to bring {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}her{?}his{\?} at least {NEEDED_PRISONER_AMOUNT} looters or bandits. You will be paid for each recruit depending on their experience.
No, not yet. I'm still looking for them.
{DEFAULT_TEXT}{ARMY_LEADER.LINK} fell during the fighting. {?ARMY_LEADER.GENDER}Her{?}His{\?} vengeful troops sweep through the city taking whatever loot they like and setting fire to the rest.

Look, I know that warriors like you can sometimes recruit bandits to your party. Some of those men might want to take their chances working for me. More comfortable in living in town, where there's always drink and women on hand, then roaming endlessly about the countryside, eh? For each one that signs up with me I'll give you a bounty, more if they have some experience.
Armies lose 20% less daily cohesion.
Of course, my {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. But sieges are always costly...
Very good. You have my blessing to summon an army if you wish, or, if you prefer to strike quickly, you may do so on your own...
As expected, your veterans have really sharpened up our boys. Please pass on my thanks to them, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}.
You lost the battle against {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME} and failed to help {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} as promised.
Well, if you fail we will deal with that, but I would prefer not to.

Gang Needs Recruits
No, I don't want to shed your blood.
10% slower build rate for town projects in settlements.
You have persuaded {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME} to disband his party and return home. You received {REWARD}{GOLD_ICON} in return for your service.
You were convinced by {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME} to let him gather support. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will be very upset about this.
You must be the king
The nobles aren't trying to starve anyone, but if they don't collect taxes, they won't be able to fight off raiders.
You may tell them. {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} will be ours within 60 days.
After listening to the town merchants, you decided to keep the restrictions on the sale of goods. Your decision made the merchants happy but disappointed the {QUEST_GIVER.LINK}
You know the dark hearts of men... Those who start as rebels end up turning bandit. Rebellion brings anarchy, not justice.
Your companion seems to have a knack with the local never-do-wells. I hear a lot of fine lads have already signed up.
Your criminal action towards {SETTLEMENT} has angered {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} and {?QUEST_GIVER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} broke the agreement you had.
You must conclude your current encounter
{DEFAULT_TEXT}Before {?ARMY_LEADER.GENDER}she{?}he{\?} fell, {ARMY_LEADER.LINK} gave orders that mercy should be shown to the people of {SETTLEMENT}.
Well, I have indeed been misinformed. You may go on your way...
Village hearths increase 20% less.
Then, what is the purpose of this?

Thank you for sparing the men to bring us that seed grain, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. That should get us through the hard times ahead.
Thus always spoke the tyrant to the oppressed! We can only pray that the Heavens help the just. Now stay out of my way.

This is a wise decision, my {?PLAYER.GENDER}lady{?}lord{\?}. Thank you.
25% production bonus to horse, mule, cow and sheep in villages owned by Khuzait rulers.
{QUEST_GIVER.LINK} wants you siege and take over the {TARGET_SETTLEMENT}
Being in army brings 25% more influence.
You have no right to go around, under arms, spreading sedition. Disperse!
You failed to deliver {REQUESTED_ANIMAL_AMOUNT} {?PLURAL}{SELECTED_ANIMAL}{.s}{?}{SELECTED_ANIMAL}{\?} to {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} in time.
Thank you for sparing some of your men to save my business. I am looking forward to resuming work.
{MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME}'s Revolt

Support level of {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME}

Yes, they are. That's why I am offering you the sum of {REWARD_GOLD}{GOLD_ICON} if you can take {TARGET_SETTLEMENT} within {TIME_LIMIT} days. I count you among the most resourceful of my captains. I think you can do this, with courage, Heaven's favor and a bit of luck. Can I tell my other lords that you will do this?
Thank you. I hope your men deal with them as soon as possible.

Thank you. {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME} is always on the move, so finding him might be tricky. But don't worry, I get regular reports from the landowners around here and I'll keep you updated on his movements...
We're working with your men to plan the ambush, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madam{?}sir{\?}. These thieves will regret the day they ever thought we were easy pickings.

Yes... As you no doubt know, this is rough work, and I've lost a lot of good lads recently. I haven't had much luck replacing them. I need men who understand how things work in our business, and that's not always easy to find. I could use bandits and looters. They usually know their stuff. But if I take them in as prisoners, they'll just slip away as soon as I get the chance. I need volunteers...
You failed to stop {MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_NAME} before he stirred up unrest in the countryside. {QUEST_GIVER.LINK} will be very upset about this.
We are working on it.
Have you put a stop to {PLURAL(MALE_LESSER_NOBLE_TITLE)}?
A courier with a ransom offer for the freedom of {CAPTIVE_HERO.NAME} has arrived
Greetings, {?PLAYER.GENDER}madame{?}sir{\?}. May I help you?
You may have a point, but don't think that we will give up demanding our rights. We will return home, but we will pursue our grievances some other way.
My boys are getting ready for the battle. I'm pretty sure your men will tip the balance of that fight in our favor. Thank you.
